main event: A text-based report from Project Blue Book discusses unidentified flying objects observed near Old Point Comfort, Virginia, including six glowing objects that changed direction sharply while in view of a DC-4 aircraft.
interesting points: The objects appeared to have an intense amber-red glow and maintained a circular shape., The formation included six objects that rolled and changed direction without radius of turn., The sighting lasted approximately 10 to 20 seconds., Nearby jet aircraft were reported in the vicinity at the time of the sighting., The report emphasizes the need for thorough investigation of unidentified objects, even when many sightings can be attributed to known phenomena.
witness description: crew members of a DC-4 aircraft
